duties_responsibilities.duty: Organize and analyze data related to training attendance and course relevance.
Utilize technical expertise to ensure accurate and high-quality data.
Design and present data in a way that assists individuals, businesses, and organizations in making better decisions.
Use automated tools to extract data from primary and secondary sources.
Remove corrupted data and fix coding errors and related problems.
Develop and maintain databases, and data systems - reorganizing data in a readable format.
Perform analysis to assess the quality and meaning of data.
Filter data by reviewing reports and performance indicators to identify and correct code problems.
Use statistical tools to identify, analyze, and interpret patterns and trends in complex data sets.
Assign numerical value to essential business functions for assessing and comparing business performance over periods of time.
Prepare reports for management stating trends, patterns, and predictions using relevant data.
Work with programmers, engineers, and management heads to identify process improvement opportunities and propose system modifications.
Devise data governance strategies and prepare final analysis reports for stakeholders.
Develop dimensional and relational data models for data marts, data warehouses, and operational data stores.
Design and develop ETL to map data from source systems to the DW and populate databases.
Validate ETL, databases, BI metadata, and reports to assure data quality.
Research data anomalies and provide recommendations for resolutions.
Support end users with specific ad hoc reporting and analytic needs.
Provide coordination support for all cohort and training roles.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Computer Science, Information Systems, Information Resource Management, Industrial Engineering, Operation Research or related fields PLUS 5 years experience.
Ability to pass VA Public Trust background investigation
